author: arxis75
content:
Hi guys! I have a question about block 13661203 transaction trie (18 transactions). There is presently no Extension node in this trie.
Could a 1-nibble (0x1) Extension node have been set to compress the common high-nibble of transactions 0x10 and 0x11 (+ child branch node for low-nibbles)?
We would end-up with an extra node and path-empty leaves, and the rootHash would be modified!
Is there a node compression rule addressing this trie malleability? Thanx!
